import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import styles from './NotificationDropdown.module.css' import DropdownCard from '../util/DropdownCard' import {GoPrimitiveDot, GoCheck} from 'react-icons/go' import {RiDeleteBinLine} from 'react-icons/ri' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import RoundWrapper from '../util/RoundWrapper' const NotificationDropdown = () => { const {notice} = useSelector(state=>state); useEffect(()=>{ notice.data.map(e=>console.log(e.body)); }, [notice]) return (
